sentences.en: ‘You fool!’ she uttered in disgust.
sentences.cn: “你这个傻瓜！”她厌恶地说道。

sentences.en: A feeling of utter helplessness washed over him.
sentences.cn: 一种全然无助的感觉涌上他的心头.

sentences.en: A look of utter confusion swept across his handsome face.
sentences.cn: 他英俊的脸上掠过一丝大惑不解的神情。

sentences.en: a scene of utter desolation
sentences.cn: 满目疮痍的景象

sentences.en: Cantor nodded without uttering a word.
sentences.cn: 坎托默不作声地点点头。

sentences.en: fifteen years of utter confusion
sentences.cn: 15年的大混乱

sentences.en: He smacked his lips but did not utter a word.
sentences.cn: 他吧嗒两下嘴,一声也不言语.

sentences.en: He was in utter despair.
sentences.cn: 他完全绝望了.

sentences.en: His career is a story of utter disaster.
sentences.cn: 他在事业上一事无成.

sentences.en: I hold those fools in utter contempt.
sentences.cn: 我根本瞧不起那些蠢货.

sentences.en: I was at an utter loss what to do.
sentences.cn: 我完全不知道该怎样做才好.

sentences.en: I watched in complete and utter horror as he pulled out a gun.
sentences.cn: 我惊恐万分地看着他拔出枪来。

sentences.en: Neil's ability to utter banalities never ceased to amaze me.
sentences.cn: 每次我都很惊讶，尼尔怎么能讲出这么索然无味的东西。

sentences.en: That's complete and utter nonsense!
sentences.cn: 那纯属一派胡言乱语！

sentences.en: That’s utter nonsense!
sentences.cn: 真是一派胡言！

sentences.en: The ship's interior was an utter shambles.
sentences.cn: 船里面一片狼藉。

sentences.en: The wounded prisoner uttered a groan.
sentences.cn: 受伤的囚犯发出一声呻吟。

sentences.en: These reports are total and utter rubbish.
sentences.cn: 这些报告废话连篇。

sentences.en: This company treats its employees with utter contempt.
sentences.cn: 这家公司对其员工不屑一顾。

sentences.en: This threw the reactionary police into utter panic.
sentences.cn: 这使反动警察极为惊恐.

sentences.en: This, of course, is utter nonsense.
sentences.cn: 这当然是一派胡言。

sentences.en: What complete and utter balls!
sentences.cn: 全是屁话！

words.tran_cn: 完全地；绝对地；全然地；彻底地，十足地

trans.tran_en: complete – used especially to emphasize that something is very bad, or that a feeling is very strong
